text: 5:22-23 Matyu 8:3; Mak 7:32Ezɨ God ko mɨgeir dɨpenimɨn bizibar garir gumazir mam, an ziam Jairus, a iza Iesusɨn gara an guamɨn uabɨ ekunigha an dagarimningɨn boroghɨn irɨgha kamaghɨn puvɨram a gaghori, “Nan guivim aremeghasa an dɨghorimra isi. Nɨ izɨva uan dafarim a datɨghtɨ an arɨmariam gɨvagh ua ikiam.”
